nodes.documentation:
@notice finaliseCheckpoint() function finalizes a checkpoint at
        a metachain.
     * @param _metachainId A metachain id to finalize a checkpoint.
@param _blockNumber A block number of a checkpoint.
@param _blockHash A block hash of a checkpoint.
     * \pre `_metachainId` is not 0.
\pre `_blockHash` is not 0.
\pre `msg.sender` should be the protocore contract.
\pre `_blockNumber` must be multiple of epoch length.
\pre `_blockNumber` must be greater than the last finalized block number.
     * \post Increment the `relativeSelfDynasty` storage value by one if the
      `msg.sender` is self protocore contract address.
\post Adds a new `Block` in the `blockchains` mapping.
\post Updates the `blockTips` mapping with provided `_blockNumber`.
nodes.name: finaliseCheckpoint

nodes.documentation:
@notice Observes the given block by anchoring its state root into the
        corresponding observer.
     * @param _metachainId Metachain id.
@param _rlpBlockHeader RLP encoded block header.
     * \pre `_metachainId` is not 0.
\pre `_rlpBlockHeader` is not 0.
\pre `_metachainId` is not `selfMetachainId`.
\pre A block must exist in `blockchains` storage for the given
     `_metachainid` and block number from the decoded `_rlpBlockHeader`.
\pre The commit status of the block must be at least `Finalized`.
\pre The status dynasty of the block is less than `relativeSelfDynasty`.
     * \post Anchors the state root in the observer contract.
nodes.name: observeBlock

nodes.documentation: @notice Get the coreputation contract address.
nodes.name: getCoreputation

nodes.documentation: @notice Get the consensus cogateway contract address.
nodes.name: getConsensusCogateway
hashKernel

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(bytes32 => mapping(uint256 => struct Coconsensus.Block storage ref))

nodes.documentation:
@notice Do the initial setup of protocore contract and initialize the
        storage of coconsensus contract.
     * @param _metachainId Metachain id.
     * \post Adds newly setup protocore's address into protocores storage variable.
\post Adds newly setup protocore's domain separator into domainSeparators
      storage variable.
\post Adds a new Block into blockchain storage variable.
\post Updates blockTips storage variable with the latest finalized
      checkpoint's block number of the newly setup protocore.
nodes.name: setupProtocore

nodes.documentation:
@notice Do the initial setup of observer contract and initialize the
        storage of coconsensus contract.
     * @param _metachainId Metachain id
     * \post If observer contract address exists for the given metachain id
      then it adds newly setup observer's address into observers
      storage variable, otherwise does nothing.
nodes.name: setupObserver

arguments.value: Source checkpoint must be finalized.

nodes.documentation:
@notice Change the checkpoint commit status of the block to `Committed`.
     * @param _metachainId Metachain id.
@param _blockNumber block number.
     * \pre The commit checkpoint status of Block at the given `_blockNumber`
     is `Finalized`.
     * \post The checkpoint commit status of the Block at the given
      `_blockNumber` is changed to `Committed`.
nodes.name: commitCheckpointInternal

     * @param _metachainId Metachain id
     * \post If observer contract address exists for the given metachain id
      then it adds newly setup observer's address into observers
      storage variable, otherwise does nothing.
nodes.name: setupObserver

nodes.name: assertOpenKernel

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(bytes32 => mapping(uint256 => struct Coconsensus.Block storage ref))

arguments.value: Source checkpoint must be finalized.

nodes.documentation:
@notice Change the checkpoint commit status of the block to `Committed`.
     * @param _metachainId Metachain id.
@param _blockNumber block number.
     * \pre The commit checkpoint status of Block at the given `_blockNumber`
     is `Finalized`.
     * \post The checkpoint commit status of the Block at the given
      `_blockNumber` is changed to `Committed`.
nodes.name: commitCheckpointInternal
updateValidatorSet

params._gasTarget: The gas target for the metablock
params._targetBlockNumber: Block number af target checkpoint.     * \pre `_metachainId` is self metachain id. \pre `_source` is not 0. \pre `_target` is not 0. \pre `_sourceBlockNumber` is a checkpoint. \pre `_targetBlockNumber` is a checkpoint. \pre `_targetBlockNumber` is greater than `_sourceBlockNumber`. \pre Source checkpoint is finalized. \pre Open kernel hash exists in `ConsensusCogateway` contract for the     given `_kernelHeight`.     * \post Updates the validator set in self protocore. \post Updates the reputation of validators. \post Opens a new metablock in self protocore.
params._updatedReputation: The array of reputation that corresponds to                       the updated validators.
params._updatedValidators: The array of addresses of the updated validators.

params._blockHash: A block hash of a checkpoint.     * \pre `_metachainId` is not 0. \pre `_blockHash` is not 0. \pre `msg.sender` should be the protocore contract. \pre `_blockNumber` must be multiple of epoch length. \pre `_blockNumber` must be greater than the last finalized block number.     * \post Increment the `relativeSelfDynasty` storage value by one if the      `msg.sender` is self protocore contract address. \post Adds a new `Block` in the `blockchains` mapping. \post Updates the `blockTips` mapping with provided `_blockNumber`.
params._blockNumber: A block number of a checkpoint.
params._metachainId: A metachain id to finalize a checkpoint.

params._rlpBlockHeader: RLP encoded block header.     * \pre `_metachainId` is not 0. \pre `_rlpBlockHeader` is not 0. \pre `_metachainId` is not `selfMetachainId`. \pre A block must exist in `blockchains` storage for the given     `_metachainid` and block number from the decoded `_rlpBlockHeader`. \pre The commit status of the block must be at least `Finalized`. \pre The status dynasty of the block is less than `relativeSelfDynasty`.     * \post Anchors the state root in the observer contract.

setup().details: This function can be called only once.

devdoc.title: Coconsensus contract - This mirrors the consensus contract on       the auxiliary chain.

commitCheckpoint(bytes32,uint256,address.notice: Updates the validator set and its reputations with opening of        a new metablock.

finaliseCheckpoint(bytes32,uint256,bytes.notice: finaliseCheckpoint() function finalizes a checkpoint at        a metachain.

observeBlock(bytes32,bytes).notice: Observes the given block by anchoring its state root into the        corresponding observer.

setup().notice: Setup function does the initialization of all the mosaic        contracts on the auxiliary chain.
